# Xuanwo's Blog
> Technical notes on open source, storage, and Rust.

This site publishes long-form articles and reference notes. Most content is in English, with some older posts in Chinese.

Preferred machine-readable sources:
- For individual posts, prefer the Markdown version by replacing the trailing `/` with `.md` (e.g. `/foo/` -> `/foo.md`). This is not available for non-post pages like `/about`.

## Key pages
- [About](https://xuanwo.io/about): Bio and contact links.
- [Archives](https://xuanwo.io/archives/): Full post archive.
- [Categories](https://xuanwo.io/categories/): Browse by category.
- [Tags](https://xuanwo.io/tags/): Browse by tag.
- [Series](https://xuanwo.io/series/): Browse by series.

## Taxonomies
- [Archives (llms)](https://xuanwo.io/archives/llms.txt): Latest posts and preferred indexes.
- [Categories (llms)](https://xuanwo.io/categories/llms.txt): Category index and per-category `llms.txt`.
- [Tags (llms)](https://xuanwo.io/tags/llms.txt): Tag index and per-tag `llms.txt`.
- [Series (llms)](https://xuanwo.io/series/llms.txt): Series index and per-series `llms.txt`.

## Feeds and indexes
- [Home](https://xuanwo.io/): Site home.

## Optional
- [GitHub](https://github.com/Xuanwo): Open source projects.
- [Telegram](https://t.me/xuanwo_tweets): Short updates.
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/OnlyXuanwo): Short updates.
